Author: 7jaka7
Title: [ANN][ICO] Fan 360 - One Community. All Stars. All Fans. Token your passion!
Body: WWW.FAN360.IO  |  WHITEPAPER  |  FACEBOOK  |  TWITTER  | REDDIT | TELEGRAM GROUP | TELEGRAM CHANNEL | MEDIUM BLOG  WHAT IS FAN360?  The Fan360 project is a blockchain-based platform for sports fans, that covers the complete fan experience. Fans get a holistic overview of everything that is happening with their favorite sports stars in real time. All the social media, news, scores and statistics are available on one site and fans can personalize what they want to follow. Besides that, fans get rewarded for their engagement through our tokenization system and get access to special fan experiences.  HOW DOES IT WORK?  All the social media, news, scores and stats are available in one place where fans get to choose the sports stars, leagues and clubs they want to follow. With AI-driven user experience news feed will be tailored to each fanâ€™s needs and taste.  For every action on the platform fans get rewarded. Each like, share or content contribution is rewarded with FAN tokens. Fans collect them through transparent blockchain system and can exchange them for special experience, merchandise, tickets or fiat.  FAN360 PLATFORM  Fan360 is not just an idea or a whitepaper. We are one of the rare ICO projects with a working product backed by technical and legal proofs of concept, with 126.000 fans!  For Fans  All the social media, news, scores and stats are available in one place where fans get to choose the sports stars and clubs they want to follow. For each action on the platform fans get rewarded with FAN tokens and exchange them for fiat, special experience and other merchandise.  For Clubs  Clubs can reach out, motivate and reward their true fans. Blockchain technology will enable ticket traceability. Understanding the needs and desires of fans will enable clubs to personalize experiences for the fans and increase engagement.  For Brands  Brands can engage with fans, the micro influencers, who will be their brand ambassadors. They can run brand activations campaigns and reward the most loyal onesith tokens. Big data enables brand customization to the fans preferences.  OUR VISION  To become the biggest sports fans community in the world!  TEAM  Fan360 is run by an experienced team, who is wholeheartedly at the project. We are supported by some of the best crypto-influencers and by 20+ world renowned sports stars.  CROWDSALE INFORMATION  More info will be available soon, stay tuned!  Target utilisation of the funds collected:    Token distribution:     WWW.FAN360.IO  |  WHITEPAPER  |  FACEBOOK  |  TWITTER  | REDDIT | TELEGRAM GROUP | TELEGRAM CHANNEL | MEDIUM BLOG
